paper.title: On the notion of value object

author.org: Department of Computer and Systems Sciences, Royal Institute of Technology, Sweden#TAB#

paper.venue: Conference on Advanced Information Systems Engineering
paper.abstract: It is increasingly recognized that business models offer an abstraction that is useful not only in the exploration of new business networks but also for the design and redesign of operational business processes. Among others, they can be used as input for a risk analysis that is crucial in cross-organizational business process design. However, the notion of value object is up till now not clearly defined. In this paper we investigate the notion of value, value objects and the activities involved when transferring value objects between business actors. We illustrate the proposed value object model by applying it on the well-known conference case.
